title: Maize
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, by October 1951 until November 1, 1951 [1]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. The lithograph is listed in October 1951 among possible gifts offered to Carnegie Institute. The purchase price was likely $150 (see price annotation by Mrs. Beal on the list of Beal gifts accessioned on November 1, 1951.)
